DataElement.preferredName: Simplified Preoperative Assessment for Appendix Tumor Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The score used to determine the likelihood of complete cytoreduction in patients with low-grade mucinous adenocarcinoma (LGMA) of the appendix based on preoperative scans.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Simplified Preoperative Assessment for Appendix Tumor Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A set of imaging criteria, based on preoperative CT scans, used to predict the likelihood for complete cytoreduction in patients with low-grade mucinous adenocarcinoma (LGMA) of the appendix. A score is determined by the presence of scalloping at 4 anatomic sites and the absence or presence of mesenteric foreshortening of the small bowel. A score under 3 is a significant predictor for complete cytoreduction._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Simplified Preoperative Assessment for Appendix Tumor Score
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A set of imaging criteria, based on preoperative CT scans, used to predict the likelihood for complete cytoreduction in patients with low-grade mucinous adenocarcinoma (LGMA) of the appendix. A score is determined by the presence of scalloping at 4 anatomic sites and the absence or presence of mesenteric foreshortening of the small bowel. A score under 3 is a significant predictor for complete cytoreduction.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Simplified Preoperative Assessment for Appendix Tumor Score
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Numeric scores,0 to 7, based on the presence of indicators used to predict the likelihood for complete cytoreduction in patients with low-grade mucinous adenocarcinoma of the appendix.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A subjective score of 7 on a prognostic scale that ranges from 0 to 7.
